entry.title: Third Post
entry.content:
I have created a Home page and hopefully an Archive.

I added my new post to a new dir called 'home', creating the home link in the nav bar. I added my old posts to an 'archive' dir to hopefully create a new archive locaiton.

to be continued...

entry.title: First Blog
entry.summary:
This is the first blog post.... that will eventually be removed!

This is my first post on my new blog. While not super informative it should convey my sense of excitement and eagerness to engage with you, the reader!

. . . . . . Some other content here

And then some more.

and some more …
